↳ In-reply-to ¬ª Tutorial: Getting started with generics - The Go Programming Language -- Okay @xuu I quite like Go's generics now ü§£ After going through this myself I like the semantics and the syntax. I'm glad they did a lot of work on this to keep it simple to both understand and use (just like the rest of Go) üëå Media #GoLang #Generics

I also like that they really are called ‚ÄúType Parameters‚Äù, which is what they are, and not some god awful scary C++ bullshit templating garbage üòÖ

Starting with version 1.18, Go has added support for generics, also known as type parameters.
